org.vaadin.artur.griddesign.shared.grid

Interface DataProviderClientRpc


  • public interface DataProviderClientRpc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(DataSourceData data, int estimatedSize)
      Informs the client that it should forget everything it has cached and initialize its cache with the given data.
      void insertRows(int firstRow, int numberOfRows)
      Informs the client that the given number of rows have been inserted at the given position.
      void removeRows(int firstRow, int numberOfRows)
      Informs the client the the given number of rows have been removed from the given position
      void updateRows(DataSourceData data)
      Informs the client the the data in the given rows has changed and any cached data for these rows must be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(DataSourceData data,
              int estimatedSize)
        Informs the client that it should forget everything it has cached and initialize its cache with the given data.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to store in the client side cache
        estimatedSize - An estimate of the total size. May or may not be correct.

      • insertRows

        void insertRows(int firstRow,
              int numberOfRows)
        Informs the client that the given number of rows have been inserted at the given position.
        Parameters:
        firstRow - The index at which the first new row is inserted
        numberOfRows - The number of inserted rows

      • removeRows

        void removeRows(int firstRow,
              int numberOfRows)
        Informs the client the the given number of rows have been removed from the given position
        Parameters:
        firstRow - The index of the first removed row
        numberOfRows - The number of removed rows

      • updateRows

        void updateRows(DataSourceData data)
        Informs the client the the data in the given rows has changed and any cached data for these rows must be updated.
        Parameters:
        data - Data of the rows which have been updated
